appearance.title: Bifa
appearance.description: Akka applikeeshiniin keessan meeshaa keessan irratti mul'atu fooyyessaa.

weekStart.title: Torbaan Wiixata irraa haa jalqabu
weekStart.description: Kun kalandaroota appii keessan keessa jiran hunda akka jijjiiramu godha.

automaticTimeZone.title: Godina yeroo keessanii bakka jireenya keessaniin অটোmatikii godhaa
automaticTimeZone.description: Yaadachiisni, beeksisonnii fi iimeeloonni godinuma yeroo keessaniin isiniif dhihaatu.
